Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

An exporter with the features of Sub::Exporter but only core
dependencies

dependencies.description: Role::Tiny - Roles: a nouvelle cuisine portion size slice of Moose

dependencies.description: Scalar::Util - A selection of general-utility scalar subroutines

dependent_to.description: Watch for changes to files, cross-platform style
